abstract: Dr N M Butler urges cooperation in ending rule of force abroad and in bldg world organization based on liberalism
snippet: If the American people propose to protect and save their own fundamental institutions they must put a stop without delay to the "rule of force as a substitute for the rule of reason in dealing with our economic and social problems," Dr. Nicholas M...

headline.main: BLAZE PEACE PATH, BUTLER URGES U.S.; We Must End Rule of Force to Save Our Basic Ideals, New Year's Message Holds ASKS WORLD-WIDE ACTION Columbia President Criticizes Proponents of 'Hands-Off' Policy in Europe's War

lead_paragraph: If the American people propose to protect and save their own fundamental institutions they must put a stop without delay to the "rule of force as a substitute for the rule of reason in dealing with our economic and social problems," Dr. Nicholas Murray Butler, president of Columbia University and head of the Carnegie Endowment for International Peace, declared yesterday in a New Year's statement.
